name: Voila! It's Puerto Galera!
description: Looking for a BEACH? Like the Best Escape Anyone Can Have? Then, ready your camera and voila it's Puerto Galera! Revel in it's pristine clear waters, enjoy an active nightlife with numerous beachfront bars and restaurants, watch fire dancers, dance and meet random people. You can also immerse yourself with the culture and lifestyle of the Irayan-Mangyan Tribe, trek into Talipanan waterfalls and savor the ambiance of the mountain hill. Get hooked with the crystal blue waters of the beach with its powdery white sand shore while delighting yourself with different exciting activities like snorkeling, kayaking, diving as well as sports such as volleyball, badminton, billiards and table tennis.
